metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7749 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - high.
metadata.Description: The SSH server implementation of AsyncSSH before 1.12.1 does not properly check whether authentication is completed before processing other requests. A customized SSH client can simply skip the authentication step. Matthijs Kooijman discovered that AsyncSSH server did not properly handle authentication under certain conditions. An attacker with a specially crafted client could use this vulnerability to skip authentication of SSH sessions.

criterions.comment: python-asyncssh package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.2-1').
